item.title: Interpret Your Decision: Logical Reasoning Regularization for Generalization in Visual Classification
item.description: This paper introduces L-Reg, a novel logical regularization technique, to improve generalization in visual classification. L-Reg effectively reduces model complexity and improves interpretability by f…
